name: Word Cubes
description:
Word Cubes - An intriguing game provided for word enthusiasts! Find the hidden words in a grid puzzle, and swipe the screen to build them! Plus, you have to connect letters in the right orders!

We design 30 packs with 580 levels in 6 grid modes: 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, 5x5, 6x6 and 7x7. Doubtlessly, it’s getting challenging gradually, but as you progress in the game, you’ll also feel an overwhelming surge of triumph.

How to play:
- Find hidden words in a grid made of cubes
- Swipe your fingers to build the word
- Move up, down, left, right and also diagonally
- You need to find the words in the right order
- The length of those words are shown below the puzzle
- Restart Button and Hints Button help you go further

With the minimalistic user interface design and challenging levels, you may fall in love with this beautiful word game!

------------------------------ Can’t connect the letter? -------------------------------------------
Please note that every puzzle is solvable, but you have to connect the letters in the right order!

If you reach a dead end, you can restart the level by clicking the restart button in the bottom left corner, and try to solve the words in a new order.

If you still have doubts or advice, please contact us by mango.games.track@gmail.com.
